Question
========

From a normally distributed population, a sample of size 25 is drawn. The mean of the sample is 13 and the standard deviation 4.2. The 95% confidence interval for the population mean is

Answerlist
----------

* (11.27 ; 14.73)
* (11.35 ; 14.65)
* (11.54 ; 14.46)
* (11.56 ; 14.44)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* (11.27 ; 14.73): Correct
* (11.35 ; 14.65): Incorrect
* (11.54 ; 14.46): Incorrect
* (11.56 ; 14.44): Incorrect
